item.title: CNBC Daily Open: Political uncertainty intensifies over the weekend
item.description: Political developments in South Korea and Syria have lent an uncertain air to markets.

item.title: China's top leaders are set to discuss GDP growth target, stimulus measures amid economic worries
item.description: Market participants will watch the events this week for clues on how policymakers plan to steer the economy through entrenched disinflation and loomin...

item.title: Kospi falls nearly 3% amid political turmoil in South Korea; Asia markets mixed
item.description: The benchmark Kospi index fell nearly 3%, while the Kosdaq dropped about 5% as investors continued to monitor the country's political situation.

item.title: Stock futures are little changed after S&P 500 posts third-straight winning week: Live updates
item.description: The S&P 500 and Nasdaq Composite closed at fresh highs Friday, ahead of key inflation data this week.

item.title: Qatar energy minister: I don't 'worry much' about Trump's vow to lift LNG exports cap
item.description: "Additional LNG and additional competition is welcome," told CNBC's Dan Murphy at the Doha Forum.
